history.text: Hi. Let's talk about the movie Zootopia! It's about a bunny, Judy, from a rural town who strives to accomplish her dream of becoming a police officer, even though everyone doubts her. It's very funny and has a great message for kids and adults alike.
i dont think ive heard of it!
who are some of the actors whose voices are in this movie? it's animated, right?
Yes it's animated, all anthropomorphic animals. Ginnifer Goodwin voices Judy, and Jason Bateman voices the other main character Nick.
oh i like jason bateman! is this a new movie?
i like the message. kind of reminds me of the little mermaid lol
It came out in 2016, so it's fairly new.
nice
I would definitely recommend it. The animation is great and it's very timely with a great message about breaking stereotypes.
im not super familiar with ginnifer goodwin, but i recall seeing her in Big Love, the series
what are some of the stereotypes that are broken in this movie?

It's always pushing people to look past the stereotypes of specific groups and use inclusive language and not act and speak out based on assumpitons. For example, many doubt that Judy will be a good police officer even though she's the academy valedictorian, because she's a bunny and not some kind of large, strong animal.
that is really cool. it definitely has a good message for kids
Judy herself learns not to stereotype, and publicaly admits to her mistakes.
she learns to get to know individual's stories and learn some of the reasons that they act the way they do.
so yeah, it has a great message and it's funny and cute and the animation is really well done, so I definitely recommend it.
that is good. so then kids can learn the importance of self reflection
i will check it out
so are we good with this conversation?

Yes. It's all about learning and growing and making mistakes and that it's okay to make mistakes, but you need to apologize from them and learn from them. Nobody's perfect. So in that way it's different from a lot of animated films.
I'm not sure. I was told I had to respond 15 times. i can't hit "finish conversation"?
ok! so we . can keep going
that is very cool. i think it is especially important in this social climate that we currently have in usa
do you watch a lot of animated movies?
Yes, that's definitely one of the reasons I like it. It seems very timely.
I don't watch animated movies very frequently, but I do enjoy them
yeah the last one i saw was bee movie
do you watch other movies or shows with jason bateman?
I haven't seen that one.
it's jerry seinfeld's movie
No, I don't think so. I'm really at at remembering actors names and stuff though
Sorry
I don't see a ton of movies in general
i used to watch a lot more but i think netflix kind of took over and now im all about tv series
i wonder if zootopia is on netflix or hulu
I'm not really sure, but I think so
how long is the movie?
do you think this movie would be suitable for adults, or just adults with kids?

uid1response.feedback: zootopia sounds like a fun but valuable movie, especially given the social climate today. i will definitely check it out! it sounds fun.

uid2response.feedback: The other user was easily persuaded to watch the movie and was ready to move on to different topics before the task was over.
